examples.content: Please provide Network design document
Sure, please provide more information regarding the Network e.g. for LAN or WAN
Please provide design document for LAN
Sure, please provide more information e.g. number of sites, expected bandwidth, reliability, number of users
Please provide design document for 3 sites
Sure, please provide more information w.r.t. security, reliability (is downtime acceptable)
Please provide design document with high security and medium reliability
Sure, do you prefer Wired or Wireless deployment
Please provide design document with high security and medium reliability
Sure, please share more info (a) number of users, (b) number of sites, (c) failure tolerance, (d) LAN/WAN
Please provide design document for 40 users, 1 site, medium reliability
Sure, will prepare and share the document shortly
Please provide Network design document for WAN
Sure, please provide more information regarding the topology, expected performance (blocking rate, delay), channel capacity, routing policy, location, ring/mesh architecture
Please provide Network design document for WAN
Sure, would you prefer SD-WAN?
Please provide Network design document with SDWAN
Sure, would you prefer the connectivity type (broadband, MPLS, hybrid)
Please provide Network design document for Observatory
Sure, please provide more details w.r.t. reliability & availability, sizing, architecture, location, sites, alerting thresholds, speed
Please provide Network design document for Industrial automation
Sure, please provide more information regarding the Zone (Industrial, DMZ, Enterprise, Safety), Resiliency, Security
Please provide Network design document for BOM
Certainly, please provide more details w.r.t. where it need to be hosted cloud/ server / Edge
Please provide SD-WAN high level design document with estimation on bringing up
Will be glad to help, please provide more details on Scalability , HA and reliability
Please generate End to End Design document for SD-WAN
I am here to help on the same, before I answer, can you provide the details on Capacity, will be it be high / medium/ low usage
Please provide SD-WAN Network design document for enterprise
Looks exiting, will it be small / medium/ big enterprise, based on that will provide on capacity details also
Please provide Security aspects for SD-WAN high level document
Security is very important aspect, Will try to help on the same
Please provide HLD for 5G Network
Latest technology to work with, Also involves SIM managament or provided by Third party vendor
Please provide high level design document for 5G Network
Certainly, HA mode for all nodes are required or only for specific nodes
Please provide high level design document for MNO
Sure, Do you need WiFi offloading details also or only 5G network specific document
Please provide high level design document for MVNO
Certainly, will privide detailed responsibility of both MVNO and MNO
HLD for 5G N/W
Certainly, please provide more details on location and roaming is supported or not
HLD for SD-WAN
Will be glad to help, please provide more details on Capacity and Scaling aspects
I want to generate High level design document for manufacturing enterprise, getting migrated from existing MPLS VPN to Cisco Viptela SDWAN network for their 10 sites
Sure, document should include each SDWAN sites Cisco Viptela how many LAN and WAN ports should be connected connected in HA mode, also IPsec tunnel configurations required?

This document should include each SDWAN sites Cisco Viptela device configuration template with 2 LAN ports connected in HA mode, 2 WAN ports, IPsec tunnel configurations to connect all rest other sites
Sure, also do you need me to add include the configuration template of cisco Viptela SDWAN devices, including configuration template to integrate with Cisco Umbrella SASE solution?

This high level design document should also include the configuration template of cisco Viptela SDWAN devices, including configuration template to integrate with Cisco Umbrella SASE solution, with 2 queue QoS profile, VPN AS number as 12345
Do you also need migration plan, network topology, and configuration details for the SDWAN network
I want to generate High level design document for manufacturing enterprise, getting migrated from existing MPLS VPN to Cisco Viptela SDWAN network for their 10 sites
Ok, Do you also need migration plan, network topology, and configuration template of cisco Viptela SDWAN devices
Please generate network design for deployment of Cisco Viptela SDWAN head-end components like v-manage, v-bond on AWS cloud
Do you need network topology diagram showing all sites connected to each other in hub and spoke model
Please generate high level design including integration of cisco Viptela SDWAN devices with Cisco Umbrella SASE solution
Do you need provide tunnel configurations to connect all rest other sites and devices topology
Please generate network design for deployment of Cisco Viptela SDWAN head-end components like v-manage, v-bond on AWS cloud
Do you need details of all manufacturing enterprise, getting migrated from existing MPLS VPN to Cisco Viptela SDWAN network
Please generate network design document for manufacturing enterprise connecting 10 sites using Cisco Viptela SDWAN solution with head-end deployed on AWS cloud
SDWAN devices with Cisco Umbrella SASE solution
Please generate High level design document for 5G Core AMF network function deployment over cloud
Sure, do you need Nokia 5G Core AMF network function deployment over AWS cloud
Please generate High level design document for Nokia 5G Core AMF network function deployment over AWS cloud
Sure, do you need subnets for external interfaces and information on EC flavor as well
Please generate High level design document for Nokia 5G Core AMF network function deployment over AWS cloud with four subnets for external interfaces and deployment flavor as default
Sure, do you need EC information and configuration commands for integration of AMF
Please generate High level design document for Nokia 5G Core AMF network function deployment over AWS cloud with configuration commands for integration of AMF with all required network functions
Sure, do you need information regarding required network functions like N1, N2 towards gNB, Nnrf towards NRF, N8, N11, N12, N22 via SCP

Please generate High level design document for Nokia 5G Core AMF network function deployment over AWS cloud with configuration commands for integration of AMF with all required network functions like N1, N2 towards gNB, Nnrf towards NRF, N8, N11, N12, N22 via SCP
Sure, will provide the final design document
